title: LoL Replay Problem Pls Help
body:
Hi so i just got a **1v5** **pentakill** at **baron** with the **buff** **as {{champion:55}}**  and i want to put it on **Youtube** but when i try to play my replay of it using lol replay it first says this: **Warning this replay is either still recording or is an old format which is no longer supported.**
So i click 'continue anyway' and then it says an **error like connection lost and check your firewalls. **
So i went online and **downloaded the latest lol reply client and the same thing happens.** i**f anyone could help me** it would be much appreciated!
thanks so much. bye

replies.body:
If this was ranked and you're ranked higher than Gold it should automatically record with OP.GG.
Check the LoLreply version and LoL version.
